title: Daily memory maintenance
description: Review and consolidate daily memory files, update MEMORY.md

title: Daily stock briefing (8am PST)
description:
3 cron jobs run daily at 8:00/8:05/8:10 AM PST:
1) Portfolio briefing — prices, changes, earnings alerts
2) Watchlist briefing — same treatment
3) Market insights — sector rotations, opportunities, trends

All post to /api/stocks endpoints and send summaries to Telegram.

title: Daily insider trading scan (8:15am PST)
description: Cron job runs fetch-insiders.js daily at 8:15am PST (after stock briefing). Fetches new SEC Form 4 filings, alerts via Telegram only for notable activity (insider buys, large sells, cluster activity).

title: Daily earnings calendar refresh (7:25am PST)
description: Cron runs daily at 7:25am PST weekdays. Refreshes earnings dates via yfinance, updates bull/bear cases via Perplexity for upcoming earnings (14-day window). Cleans old briefings (>7d) and market insights (>5d). Model: Sonnet.

title: Options flow scan (8:20am PST)
description: Cron runs daily at 8:20am PST weekdays. Scans unusual options activity via fetch-options.js + yfinance across all portfolio/watchlist tickers. Alerts on Telegram for high-score signals (>=50). Model: Sonnet.

title: Jarvis daily summary (8:25am PST)
description: Cron runs daily at 8:25am PST weekdays. Jarvis writes a personal analyst note with sentiment, picks (buy/hold/trim/sell/watch), and key events. Posts to /api/stocks/summary and delivers via Telegram. Model: Opus.

title: Task watcher (every 30min)
description: Cron runs every 30 min. Also triggered instantly by webhook when new backlog task is added. Checks for instant/scheduled/pending tasks and picks them up. Model: Sonnet.

title: Weekly memory maintenance (Sun 9am PST)
description: Cron runs Sunday 9am PST. Reviews daily memory logs, updates MEMORY.md with distilled learnings, removes outdated info. Model: Gemini.

title: Build AI Resume Tailor tool
description: ✅ COMPLETED — AI Resume Tailor tool on port 3342. Features: paste master resume (saved), paste job posting, AI tailors resume + generates cover letter, ATS score, keyword matching, tips. PDF downloads. History of past sessions. Accessible at http://localhost:3342
